title: Can we say Good Luck or Best of Luck? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Abrar from Bangladesh Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Sheikh Wa Alaikumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Sheikh, can I say good luck or best of luck to my friends and family or will it exclude me from among the 70,000 Muslims? And which is the best alternative Islamically? Jazak Allah Khairan You want to make dua for them the best of luck or asking them to wish you good luck? No, I just for example as a greeting and they have like exams or something and I say to my friend like best of luck No problem in that Inshallah, there is no problem in saying that
